mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, T.TEAM_NO, T.TEAM_NAME, T.BOSS_ID, T.CHANGE_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN TEAM T ON (M.MEMBER_ID = T.BOSS_ID) WHERE BOSS_ID = #{bossId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M JOIN TEAM T ON (M.MEMBER_ID = T.BOSS_ID) WHERE BOSS_ID = #{bossId}
SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER_TEAM MT JOIN MEMBER M ON (MT.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE JOIN_STATUS = 'Y' AND TEAM_NO = #{teamNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATTINGROOM(ROOM_NO, ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_CTRNO.NEXTVAL, #{roomId}, #{roomName})
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_NO FROM CHATTINGROOM WHERE ROOM_ID = #{roomId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATTING(CHAT_NO, MEMBER_NO, ROOM_NO) VALUES(SEQ_CTNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{roomNo})
mapper.select: SELECT CR.ROOM_NO, CR.ROOM_NAME, CM.MESSAGE_NO, CM.MESSAGE, CM.MESSAGE_TIME, M.MEMBER_NO , M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_ID , CT.CHAT_NO FROM CHATTINGROOM CR JOIN CHATTING CT ON (CR.ROOM_NO = CT.ROOM_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = CT.MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT * FROM CHATTINGMESSAGE WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM CHATTINGMESSAGE GROUP BY ROOM_NO)) CM ON (CM.ROOM_NO = CR.ROOM_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY CM.MESSAGE_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHATTINGROOM CR JOIN CHATTING CT ON (CR.ROOM_NO = CT.ROOM_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = CT.MEMBER_NO) JOIN (SELECT * FROM CHATTINGMESSAGE WHERE ROWID IN (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM CHATTINGMESSAGE GROUP BY ROOM_NO)) CM ON (CM.ROOM_NO = CR.ROOM_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATTINGMESSAGE (MESSAGE_NO, ROOM_NO, MEMBER_NO, MESSAGE, MESSAGE_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_CTMNO.NEXTVAL, #{roomNo}, #{memberNo}, #{message}, #{messageTime})
mapper.select: SELECT CM.MESSAGE_NO, CM.ROOM_NO, M.MEMBER_NO, CM.MESSAGE, CM.MESSAGE_TIME, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM CHATTINGMESSAGE CM JOIN MEMBER M ON (CM.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE CM.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY CM.ROOM_NO DESC
SELECT C.ROOM_NO, M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, M.MEMBER_ID FROM CHATTING C JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
